data.title: The Doyle Foundation Scholarship
data.meta_description: Doyle Foundation Scholarship provides financial assistance for college in any state to seniors and graduates from high schools in Huntington Beach, California, and Washoe County, Nevada, or from community colleges in southern California or Washoe County.
data.text:
Requirements

This program is open to 1) seniors graduating from high schools or adult schools in Huntington Beach, California; 2) recent graduates of those high schools, including students who have completed a GED; 3) seniors graduating from high schools or adult schools in Washoe County, Nevada; 4) recent graduates of those high schools, including students who have completed a GED; and 5) current students and graduates from community colleges in Orange County, California or Washoe County, Nevada.

Applicants must be planning to attend a college or university in any state.

Both merit and needbased scholarships are available.
